get.description: Currently only returns deliveries with failed attempts.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination token to use to continue listing delivery attempts. This value is returned from the previous call. When this field is supplied the filter field should not be supplied.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of delivery attempts to retrieve. Defaults to 5000 if not specified.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Expression to filter the result set. For more information about filtering results, see https://support.lusid.com/knowledgebase/article/KA-01914.

400.description: The details of the input related failure

404.description: No deliveries exists with the provided filter(s)

get.summary: [EXPERIMENTAL] ListEventTypes: Lists all of the available event types.
[EXPERIMENTAL] GetEventType: Gets the specified event type schema.

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: The event type to retrieve schema for.

400.description: The details of the input related failure

404.description: No event type exists with the specified type

requestBody.description: The data required to trigger a manual event.

400.description: The details of the input related failure

get.summary: [EARLY ACCESS] ListAccessControlledResources: Get resources available for access control
get.description: Get the comprehensive set of resources that are available for access control

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Expression to filter the result set. Read more about <see href="https://support.lusid.com/filtering-results-from-lusid"> filtering results from LUSID</see>.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Fields to order the result set. Read more about <see href="https://support.lusid.com/filtering-results-from-lusid" /> filtering results from LUSID.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Encoded page string returned from a previous search result that will retrieve the next page of data. When this field is supplied the filter  field should not be supplied.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of subscriptions to retrieve.

pathAndQuery.description: The url to send the request to.

attemptTime.description: The time that the delivery was attempted.

eventId.description: The identifier of the associated event.

notificationId.description: The identifier of the associated notification.

deliveryChannel.description: The delivery channel of the message.

messageDetails.description: The Details of the delivery message as JSON string.

attempts.description: A list of all the delivery attempts made for this message.

plainTextBody.description: The plain text body of the email

htmlBody.description: The HTML body of the email (if any)

id.description: The identifier of the event type

entity.description: The entity against which the event originated

application.description: The application associated with the event

href.description: A URI for retrieving this schema

ManualEvent.description: Details of a manually triggered event

subject.description: The subject of the manual event

message.description: The message of the manual event

jsonMessage.description: The JSON message of the manual event

ManualEventBody.description: The body of the manual event

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the manual event

eventId.description: The event ID of the manual event

userId.description: The user ID of the manual event

requestId.description: The request ID of the manual event

ManualEventHeader.description: The header of the manual event

ManualEventRequest.description: The information required to trigger a manual event

eventType.description:
The type of event to subscribe to. The list of available event types can be discovered
by calling the List available EventTypes API endpoint.

filter.description: A filter on the event. See https://support.lusid.com/filtering-results-from-lusid for more information. If not provided, all events will be matched

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the notification

deliveryChannel.description: The medium through which the notification is delivered

createdAt.description: The time at which the subscription was made

createdBy.description: The user who made the subscription

lastModifiedAt.description: The time at which the subscription was last modified

lastModifiedBy.description: The user who last modified the subscription

lastUpdated.description: The time at which the notification status was last updated

NotificationStatus.description: The status object of a notification

scope.description: The scope used to identify an entity

code.description: The code used to identify an entity

recipients.description: The phone numbers to which the SMS will be sent to (E.164 format)

SmsNotificationType.description: The information required to create or update an SMS notification

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the subscription

status.description: The current status of the subscription

userIdCreated.description: The user who made the subscription

UpdateSubscription.title: UpdateSubscriptionRequest

description.description: The summary of the services provided by the subscription

status.description: The current status of the subscription. Possible values are: Active, Inactive

UpdateSubscription.description: The information required to update a subscription

httpMethod.description: The HTTP method such as GET, POST, etc. to use on the request

url.description: The URL to send the request to

authenticationType.description: The type of authentication to use on the request

authenticationConfigurationItemPaths.description:
The paths of the Configuration Store configuration items that contain the authentication configuration. Each
authentication type requires different keys:
- Lusid - None required
- BasicAuth - Requires 'Username' and 'Password'
- BearerToken - Requires 'BearerToken' and optionally 'BearerScheme'
            
e.g. the following would be valid assuming that the config is present in the configuration store at the
specified paths:
            
    "authenticationType": "BasicAuth",
    "authenticationConfigurationItemPaths": {
        "Username": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminUser",
        "Password": "config://personal/myUserId/WebhookConfigurations/ExampleService/AdminPassword"
    }

contentType.description: The type of the content e.g. Json

WebhookNotificationType.description: The information required to create or update a Webhook notification
